content: crochet a classic men s ribbed crochet scarf for all the men in your family with its simple design and easy-flowing stitches it s sure to become a favorite you will need 2 balls of lion brand hue + me yarn in the color fatigues weight 5/bulky a total of 274 yards or you can use another bulky weight yarn 8 0 mm crochet hook scissors darning needle
